∀ (G : ℝ → ℝ) (r : ℝ), (∀ (m n : ℤ), G r = |r - real.sqrt (m^2 + 2 * n^2)|) →
  Filter.Tendsto G Filter.atTop (nhds 0)

∀ (G : ℝ → ℝ) (hG : ∀ r, G r = ⨅ (m n : ℤ), |r - Real.sqrt (m^2 + 2 * n^2)|), 
  Filter.Tendsto G Filter.atTop (nhds 0)
∀ (G : ℝ → ℝ) (r : ℝ), (G r = ⨅ (m n : ℤ), |r - Real.sqrt (↑m ^ 2 + 2 * ↑n ^ 2)|) → Filter.Tendsto G Filter.atTop (nhds 0)

∀ {r : ℝ}, 0 < r → ∃ (G : ℝ → ℝ), (∀ r, G r = Nat.Inf (Set.range (fun ⟨m, n⟩ : ℤ × ℤ => |r - Real.sqrt (m^2 + 2 * n^2)|))) ∧
  Filter.Tendsto G Filter.atTop (nhds 0)

∀ {r : ℝ},
  0 < r →
  let G := (fun r => ⨅ (m n : ℤ), |r - Real.sqrt (m ^ 2 + 2 * n ^ 2)|) in
  Filter.Tendsto G Filter.atTop (nhds 0)

∀ {G : ℝ → ℝ} (hG : ∀ r : ℝ, G r = Inf {abs (r - Real.sqrt (m^2 + 2*n^2)) | m n : ℤ}),
  Filter.Tendsto G Filter.atTop (nhds 0)

Theorem lim_exists_and_equals_zero :
  ∀ {r : ℝ} (G : ℝ → ℝ), 
  (∀ r, G r = infi (λ (m n : ℤ), |r - real.sqrt (m^2 + 2 * n^2)|)) → 
  Filter.Tendsto G Filter.atTop (nhds 0) :=

  -- Proof goes here
end

begin
  sorry
end

∀ (G : ℝ → ℝ) (r : ℝ),
  (∀ r > 0, G r = ⨅ (m n : ℤ), |r - Real.sqrt (m^2 + 2*n^2)|) →
  Filter.Tendsto G Filter.atTop (nhds 0)
